name: ETHGlobal Hackathon
description: Join the world's premier Ethereum hackathon where developers collaborate to build innovative decentralized applications. With over $175,000 in prizes and support from industry leaders, this is your chance to turn your ideas into reality.
prizes: $175,000 available in prizes from sponsors including Blockscout, 1inch, LayerZero, Flow, Pyth Network, Chainlink, and more
